title: Instructional Design for Clinical Practice and Skills Assessment in Dental Treatment for Undergraduate Dental Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic dental science knowledge and preliminary clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Clinical practice simulation and project-based assessment environment utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Independently diagnose and create treatment plans for dental cases ranging from minimal to moderate complexity
Achieve practical skills to accurately perform root canal therapy and retreatment using 3D simulation equipment
Standardize and apply processes for informed consent documentation and case difficulty assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
